author: customer
text:
Representative would promise you anything just to get you off the phone. 
They sent back a pair of jeans that I consigned because they said it was damaged. It wasn’t damaged when I sent it in! I even sent them pictures to show the tearing was not there before. They promised on the phone to give me $100 site credit for the issue. They lied and when I contacted them again, there are no notes in that regard! I won’t trust this company again.
title: The Real Real is not trustworthy

author: C M Gooden
text: Received order on time, but order was incomplete. Ordered and charged for a gift box that was not received with the scarf. When I called to inquire about the missing gift box, I was given the runaround and on the phone for over 25 minutes mostly on hold. I was finally told that I would be contacted by email in 24 to 48 hours. It has been over 48 hours and I received no email. The scarf was a gift and the right box for presentation is important. As I was charged for it, I don’t know why they would not simply send it. For an upscale product, one expects competent service.
title: Order not complete

author: Marie Eisenmann
text:
I ordered a Judith Lieber bag described to be in very good condition.  Minor exterier wear.  When I received the purse, it was shipped and packed well.  However it has a largish hole in the leather.  This was not shown in the pictures or disclosed although if I look at the pics now I can see the hole (the angle of the pic makes it hard)  

The purse is currently at a leather shop being repaired (the best they can do is patch the hole)

My issue is the hole should have been disclosed, supposedly this is not returnable but how is a non-disclosed hole not returnable?
